name: ts-for-gir-gtk-3-gettext-example
description: Simple Gjs Gtk 3 example app that shows how you can translate strings with gettext

scripts.build:types: npm run ts-for-gir -- generate Gtk-3.0 -e gjs --useNamespace -t esm
scripts.build: npm run build:types && npm run build:app
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run start:app
scripts.validate: npm run validate:types && npm run validate:app

author: Pascal Garber <pascal@artandcode.studio>
